programme.title: PL Greatest : Man Utd/Chelsea 2014
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, rewind to 2014 for a pulsating encounter between Manchester United and Chelsea at Old Trafford.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a rematch of the 2023 Madrid Open final, world number one Iga Swiatek and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka meet again to determine this year's women's singles champion.

programme.title: ATP Final: Indian Wells
programme.desc: Britain's Jack Draper competes in his maiden ATP Masters 1000 final at Indian Wells as the top-10 bound Brit faces Holger Rune. Draper knocked out Carlos Alcaraz in the last four. (16.03)

programme.title: WTA Final: Madrid
programme.desc: In a repeat of the 2023 US Open final, two-time Madrid champion Aryna Sabalenka eyes another marquee title against Coco Gauff, who won their only prior clay-court meeting. (03.05)

programme.title: ATP Final: Montpellier
programme.desc: In his 17th career final and second of 2025, Felix Auger-Aliassime takes on American qualifier Aleksandar Kovacevic, who stunned top seed Andrey Rublev, for the Montpellier crown. (02.02)

programme.title: ATP Final: Delray Beach
programme.desc: A first tour-level title is within reach for Alejandro Davidovich Fokina, as the Spaniard looks to overcome seventh seed Miomir Kecmanovic of Serbia in the Delray Beach Open final. (16.02)

programme.title: ATP Next Gen Final 2024
programme.desc: Undefeated 18-year-old Joao Fonseca, the second youngest player in tournament history, faces Learner Tien for the Next Gen ATP Finals title. Fonseca beat Tien earlier this week. (22.12)

programme.title: ATP Final: Rotterdam
programme.desc: Carlos Alcaraz attempts to cap his debut at the ABN AMRO Open in Rotterdam with a 17th tour-level title, as the top seed squares off against world number six Alex de Minaur. (09.02)

programme.title: ATP Final: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Chasing a sixth ATP 1000 title and a first in Monte-Carlo, 21-year-old Spaniard Carlos Alcaraz competes in a blockbuster clash with first-time Masters finalist Lorenzo Musetti. (13.04)

programme.title: ATP Final: Rome
programme.desc: World number one Jannik Sinner takes on soon-to-be world number two Carlos Alcaraz in a blockbuster Italian Open final. Between them, the pair have won the last five majors. (18.05)

programme.title: US Open: Alcaraz v Sinner
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz play out the next chapter in their rivalry as the reigning champion and the 2022 winner compete for the US Open crown in New York. (07.09)

programme.title: ATP Final: Tokyo
programme.desc: World number one Carlos Alcaraz and former finalist Taylor Fritz - the top two seeds - go one on one for the title. Fritz got the better of Alcaraz in last week's Laver Cup meeting. (30.09)

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: A US Open finalist one month prior, Caroline Wozniacki's 2014 WTA Finals campaign got underway against then world number two Maria Sharapova in Singapore.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Andre Agassi and Pete Sampras met in the 2001 Indian Wells final - one of 34 career meetings. Agassi eyed a second consecutive win over Sampras in their first meeting in over a year.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In the 1996 Indian Wells final, Steffi Graf - having made her competitive return after a four-month injury layoff - would compete with Spain's Conchita Martinez for the title.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a battle of generations, two of the all-time greats Roger Federer and Andre Agassi fought for the year-end championship in 2003. Federer was aiming for his first title on American soil.

programme.title: ATP Final: Buenos Aires
programme.desc: Joao Fonseca's soaring career hits new heights, as the 18-year-old becomes the youngest ATP clay finalist since Carlos Alcaraz when he faces Francisco Cerundolo in Buenos Aires. (16.02)

programme.title: WTA Final: Rouen
programme.desc: In Rouen, top seed Elina Svitolina - entering her first final since January last year - faces Serbia's Olga Danilovic, the third seed, for the title. (20.04)

programme.title: Agassi v Martin 1999
programme.desc: Andre Agassi's 1999 career renaissance concluded with an unforgettable victory at the US Open, earning a fifth Grand Slam title at the expense of his fellow countryman Todd Martin.

programme.title: McEnroe v Borg 1981
programme.desc: In winning the 1981 US Open men's singles title, John McEnroe inflicted a career-ending defeat upon long-time rival Bjorn Borg, as the Swede later retired from the professional game.

programme.title: McEnroe v Borg 1980
programme.desc: With the French Open and Wimbledon secured, Bjorn Borg met defending champion John McEnroe in the men's singles final at the 1980 US Open. Borg was bidding for his first US Open title.

programme.title: Connors v Borg 1976
programme.desc: Home favourite Jimmy Connors fought the number two seed Bjorn Borg in the finale to the men's singles at the 1976 US Open. Borg dispatched champion Manuel Orantes en route to the final.

programme.title: ATP Finals: Turin Final
programme.desc: World number one Carlos Alcaraz faces Italy's reigning ATP Finals champion Jannik Sinner in their sixth meeting of the year, marking the finale to the 2025 Tour season in Turin. (16.11)

programme.title: ATP Next Gen Final 2024
programme.desc: Undefeated 18-year-old Joao Fonseca, the second youngest player in tournament history, faces Learner Tien for the Next Gen ATP Finals title. Fonseca beat Tien earlier this week. (22.12)

programme.title: WTA Finals
programme.desc: Aryna Sabalenka and Elena Rybakina - both undefeated in Riyadh - bid to become a first-time WTA Finals champion. This is the 14th meeting between the two, with Sabalenka 8-5 ahead. (08.11)

programme.title: ATP Finals: Turin Final
programme.desc: World number one Carlos Alcaraz faces Italy's reigning ATP Finals champion Jannik Sinner in their sixth meeting of the year, marking the finale to the 2025 Tour season in Turin. (16.11)

programme.title: ATP Next Gen Final 2024
programme.desc: Undefeated 18-year-old Joao Fonseca, the second youngest player in tournament history, faces Learner Tien for the Next Gen ATP Finals title. Fonseca beat Tien earlier this week. (22.12)

programme.title: Live: ATP Next Gen
programme.desc: The opening day of play at the 2025 Next Gen ATP Finals, held in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: WTA Cincinnati 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the women's singles at the Cincinnati Open, a WTA Tour 1000 hard-court event.

programme.title: ATP Final: Indian Wells
programme.desc: Britain's Jack Draper competes in his maiden ATP Masters 1000 final at Indian Wells as the top-10 bound Brit faces Holger Rune. Draper knocked out Carlos Alcaraz in the last four. (16.03)

programme.title: WTA Final: Indian Wells
programme.desc: Mirra Andreeva meets top seed Aryna Sabalenka in the Indian Wells final. Sabalenka avenged her Australian Open defeat to Keys in the semis, while Andreeva dethroned Swiatek. (16.03)

programme.title: Live: ATP Next Gen
programme.desc: The opening day of play at the 2025 Next Gen ATP Finals, held in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: ATP Final: Barcelona
programme.desc: Bidding for his second title in seven days, world number two Carlos Alcaraz sets his sights on his third Barcelona Open win, facing Denmark's Holger Rune in the final. (20.04)

programme.title: ATP Finals: Turin Final
programme.desc: World number one Carlos Alcaraz faces Italy's reigning ATP Finals champion Jannik Sinner in their sixth meeting of the year, marking the finale to the 2025 Tour season in Turin. (16.11)

programme.title: WTA Final: Adelaide
programme.desc: In an all-American final at the Adelaide International, Jessica Pegula and Madison Keys contest the third instalment of their rivalry, with the head-to-head record at one apiece. (11.01)

programme.title: WTA Final: Stuttgart
programme.desc: In Stuttgart, world number one Aryna Sabalenka, a three-time runner-up in this competition, meets Jelena Ostapenko for a clash in the final. (21.04)
